title: Almost Lover
description: This book is the first four chapters to the book Part-Time Lover.He said it was fate. I said it was chance. After all, what were the chances that the man I’d met one fine afternoon on the outskirts of the city would become my almost lover?He felt like a risk I needed to take. But what happened next would challenge all my beliefs about fate, chance and love…*a preview to Part-Time Lover*
author: Lauren Blakely
